mapper.insert: insert into bus_sale (product_id, count_, user_id, sale_price, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, remark_, enable_) values (#{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{salePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enable,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update bus_sale set product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, count_ = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sale_price = #{salePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark_ = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enable_ = #{enable,jdbcType=BIT} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id_, product_id, count_, user_id, sale_price, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, remark_, enable_ from bus_sale where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
